hibernate-mapping.query: select institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord from InstitutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord as institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord order by institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord.institutionalItemId, institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord.updatedDate desc

select institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord from InstitutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord as institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord where institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord.institutionalItemId = ? and institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord.indexProcessingType.id = ?

insert into InstitutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord (institutionalItemId, indexProcessingType, updatedDate) select institutionalItem.id, indexProcessingType, current_timestamp() from InstitutionalItem institutionalItem, IndexProcessingType indexProcessingType where institutionalItem.institutionalCollection.leftValue between :leftValue and :rightValue and institutionalItem.institutionalCollection.treeRoot.id = :treeRootId and indexProcessingType.id = :processingTypeId and institutionalItem.id not in ( select institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord.institutionalItemId from InstitutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord as institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord)

insert into InstitutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord (institutionalItemId, indexProcessingType, updatedDate) select institutionalItem.id, indexProcessingType, current_timestamp() from InstitutionalItem institutionalItem, IndexProcessingType indexProcessingType where indexProcessingType.id = :processingTypeId and institutionalItem.id not in ( select institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord.institutionalItemId from InstitutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord as institutionalItemIndexProcessingRecord)
